name: BREAKOUT 2020
description:
SMASH! POW! CRUNCH! A brick wall appears at the top of the screen, your mission is to  smash two walls off the playfield - one brick at a time.

NOTE 

This project is a prototype and will receive some updates.

CREDITS

Inspired by the 1987 game Breakout released on the Atari 2600.

Fonts

Press Start 2P Font by codeman38, FFF Forward Font by Fonts For Flash, monoton Font by Vernon Adams & Nulshock Font by Raymond Larabie. Available from 1001fonts.com.

Audio

Retro 8Bit Sounds by Gamemaster Audio available from Unreal Engine Marketplace
